has the feeling it is going to be a long week
sighs and stands up. She's going to need some tea. And she'll make some for Ama too while she's up.

puts his phone away knowing that he has to come up with a plan. He's going to be butting heads with his composer and mother. Normally one would be reluctant to do something such as attack their boss and parent. Especially if they took care of them for a good amount of time. Still, he can't forgive the two of them so easily. Had certain events not transpired then..... "Hmn..." The boy placed a finger below his lower lip whilst lost in thought. With every pair of rules, no matter how strict or vague, there are loopholes. He'd review over the terms that were to reach conclusion that would place the odds in his favor. After all, he can't go on his whole life relying on his natural born luck. He has to use it to his advantage to make something of himself....

Tea first. Always tea. She was aware of what had happened, of her own actions, of how likely someone in this whole event was of pulling ​something​ of some description. But that was not her problem. Yet. First there would be tea. And then it would be figuring out how best to prepare for a potential loss of abilities. And fighting her son. But first, tea.

Something of himself.... His parents' words echo in his head as he thought about what he could possibly become. He hadn't put much thought into what he wanted to do with his future.. Even if his fate had been decided by others, he never figured out what he truly valued other than the approval of others. He was content with being remembered by others and leaving a good impression in their life. --However seeking that type of path has placed him in a maze. A detour away from his potential as a functioning cog in society...

Maybe....taking the spotlight and playing the hero isn't what it's meant to be.... maybe just being himself and doing what good deeds he meant without looking for affection is something that would determine if he was good person in the end... Could this be what Jean meant by "not seeking happiness. it'd come to you?" The boy fixed his eyes on the ceiling in his room..

replaying all of his life up until now... Going out of his way to be with Nora....Placing himself as Amaryllis' Knight. Pushing the idea that Jean was his brother.... and partnering up with a fragile child like Uso.. He's survived by the skin of his teeth only to be filled with more desire for attention....Judai...
the boy who believed he was eliminating the Greedy ones from the world...
​ has been the greedy one all along.
decides its time to take a trip to the hot springs... He needs to think more on this later. For now he needs to rejuvenate and prepare.
